Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Interrupts.Name: Snatch Memory
Interrupts.Trigger: A foe in range 2 uses an ability and the ability resolves.
Interrupts.Effect: That foe must save. On a failed save, they lose the memory of that ability, becoming unable to use it until this Hob is defeated or the Hob uses this ability again.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.
